text: A small hidden place that serves great coffee ( much better than some known places near by). I also got a croissant. Lived it.tge man who served me was also very kind and attentive.
Good coffee! The pain au chocolat also is good. Our go to place for coffee and croissants after a run/walk in the mornings!
Lovely little hole in the wall cafe with a kind lady who let me sit down first n pay later when she saw me w my pup. Coffee is amazing and their sticky buns are to die for :)

Good coffee for a better price but no sitting place and can get very crowded.
The coffee is pretty strong over here and if you go for an afternoon coffee this place wonâ€™t be crowded. But if you visit this place for breakfast you canâ€™t even step foot into this.
The concept of this place uses and open kitchen which can be troublesome as you need to serve the people and the only seating place is outside. Other than the seating problem this place is good and has a lot of good treats and coffee.
